content: The Maelstrom took my car away, so Glenn prepared a cabin tent for me. Pretty thoughtful, isn't he? I wonder what it'll look like once set up...
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content: No need to ask—I wholeheartedly accept!
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content: {思考中}I remember... I was originally looking for a spot to set up the tent... Oh, by the way, have you seen a strange butterfly?
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content:
But after wandering around for so long, I still couldn't find a suitable camping spot.
       <size=30>Strange... the "readings" before I set out indicated everything would go smoothly...</size>
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content:
Really?
That's exactly what I'd expect from you!
Here's my <color=#8AAB4B>camping tent roll</color>. I'll leave it to you.
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content: Leave it to me! I have navigation software at my disposal.
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content:
Hearing you say that, my heart skipped a beat.
You're so sweet.
Here's my <color=#8AAB4B>camping tent roll</color>. I'll leave it to you.
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content:
It flickered with a light similar to my tail,
and before I knew it, I followed it here...
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content: As soon as you help me pick a place for the tent, we'll know. I'm so excited!
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content:
Then? Then...
The butterfly disappeared.
And so did the way back.
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content: ...Yeep? Your Backpack seems to be quite full. If you would be so kind, please press <color=#38b6c5>E</color> to open your Backpack and make some room for the tent!
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content: <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>, would you be willing to help me find a good spot for my tent?
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>? 
Were you looking for me?
Hmm? How did I end up here...
info: 拜托选址-幻雪_主流程文本
